#KEY
# _bb = blackbody fit to all wavelengths, _opt = fit only data redwards of 3000A
# L_bb = luminosity from Stefan-Boltzman; L_opt = same but using T_opt and R_opt
# (in contrast, bol_Gaia16apd_SDAUBVri.txt file contains trapezoidal integration over observed wavelengths)
